{{DEFAULTSORT:Driving of the Dark}}
'''''The Driving of the Dark''''' was a [[song]] about fighting [[dark elf|dark elves]].{{Cite polyhedron/62/The New Rogues Gallery: The Freelancers}}
document_data.History: This musical work was known in the 14{{th}} century [[DR]]. It was derived from the [[adventurer]]s [[Kevin Mittak|Kevin]] and [[Krynna Mittak]]'s many exploits fighting against drow.
